field.name: theme
field.label: Primary Theme
field.description: Select the primary theme. If no theme is selected, the core theme will be used.

field.name: theme_mobile
field.label: Primary Mobile Theme
field.description: Select the primary mobile theme. This is the theme that will be loaded on mobile devices. If no theme is selected, the mobilecore theme will be used. If that theme does not exist, the core theme will be used.

field.name: plugins
field.label: Enable Plugins
field.description: Choose whether or not you would like to enable custom Motif plugins to load.

field.name: debug
field.label: Debug Mode
field.description: Select whether or not the template should display in debug mode. If the template is in debug mode, you can add debug=1 to the URL to see where various files are loaded from your theme.

field.name: manual_theme
field.label: Enable theme=THEME_NAME functionality
field.description: Select whether or not you would like to allow adding zt=THEME_NAME to URL's to manually override which theme is loaded.
